overview: In this remix by artist Eileen Maxson a series of famous Disney characters find out their lovers aren't exactly the perfect idealized visions of deified manhood depicted in the original animated features. Maxson placed audio clips from 90210, Dawson's Creek, and Jack Nicholson in the film Carnal Knowledge to video clips of classic scenes from Disney's Cinderella, Sleeping Beauty, and Lady and the Tramp, resulting in eye-opening juxtapositions that deromanticize the stereotypical gender-based fantasies ever-present in Disney fairy tales.
title: CINDERELLA+++
